headline: Inflation data, big bank earnings, and Netflix results: What to watch this week
summary: A busy week ahead for investors will see inflation data, the debate about the Fed's next move, and the start of second quarter earnings season all come into focus after a flurry of trade activity last week.

headline: Truist Increases PT on Bank of America to $53, Maintains Buy Rating On the Stock
summary: Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) is one of the 12 Best Stocks to Invest in for Good Returns. On July 9, Truist increased the price target on Bank of America Corporation (NYSE:BAC) from $51 to $53, maintaining its Buy rating on the stock.
